'''Fabled Emperor Onikabuto''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It can be obtained by completing the "The Three Undeceivables" ending of [[Shikanoin Heizou]]'s [[Hangout Event]] Act I: [[Trap 'Em by Storm]].
